column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

* Amazon RDS for MySQL: The monthly cost has increased from 4696.28 USD to 17381.79 USD. The total 12 months cost is now 208581.42 USD. The Utilization of RDS instances has been increased from 50 to 100. The Quantity of RDS instances has been increased from 4 to 8.
* VPN Connection: The monthly cost has increased from 73 USD to 146 USD. The total 12 months cost is now 1752.00 USD. The number of Site-to-Site VPN Connections has been doubled from 2 to 4.
